reviews.text: I was visiting the hotel for a seminar that took place in it. Location for this reason was good. Unfortunately there was no heating the first night I slept in and I had to ask for an electrical heating device in the middle of the night. Next day the maintenance guy came to fix it, saying they renewed the whole heating system but I guess they forgot to check if every room is properly heated.

Good quality hotel in an excellent location which we used for a Business trip to the Messe.

U-Bahn access was a quick 10 min walk to get on the U4 and then straight to the Festhalle/Messe.

Rooms were simple but absolutely perfect for those on business and staff were friendly and helpful.

Although parking is limited, there are numerous 24 hour public access car parks around within a couple of minutes walk from the hotel, which made bringing our car very easy.

The hotel was very very clean. Staff very attentive. Best hotel Iâ€™ve stayed in Frankfurt. Safe area for women to walk at night. very convenient area to stay in and I would definitely get the breakfast
Good for the price. The room was very clean and fairly well-equipped. The staff at the front desk were really friendly and helpful. There is a tram stop and an S-Bahn stop nearby.

This must be the best hotel to stay at in frankfurt. Very clean and modern.  Loved the gym. Loved the filtered water , sparkling water tap. Loved the breakfast buffet, by far the best we've ever had. Liked the clean neighbourhood. Liked the proximity to restaurants and train. Liked the bike hire facility downstairs.  The hafenpark park nearby has to be one of the nicest parks in the world, full of happy people chilling out. A lot of business people there but we thought it was romantic for us as a couple. Excellent value too.
